description: After initial execution, [BPFDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1161) forks itself and runs the fork with the `--init` flag, which allows it to execute secondary clean up operations. The parent process terminates leaving the forked process to be inherited by the legitimate process init.(Citation: Sandfly BPFDoor 2022)

external_references.description: The Sandfly Security Team. (2022, May 11). BPFDoor - An Evasive Linux Backdoor Technical Analysis. Retrieved September 29, 2023.
